description.value: An extension to support recording of additional contacts, who should be contacted regarding questions arising from the service request.

purpose.value: This extension extends the ServiceRequest Resource to support the recording of additional contacts, who should be contacted regarding questions arising from the service request. This differs from the requestor and responsibleClinician.
